Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
TROUBLES CONTINUE ON [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHalloran],HALLORAN V]]!


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],Outreach]]: Halloran V has continued to see its local militia plagued by fierce infighting, as battalion and regimental commands take sides over the FedCom Civil War. Militia units have solidified control over several zones and transportation arteries across the planet.  Particularly throughout the Caspian Mountains, highway checkpoints have brought trade to a standstill. As standard practice, they impose outrageous tariffs and make outright seizures.


Would you like to know more?

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
TROUBLES CONTINUE ON HALLORAN V!:


The [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHMCE],Halloran Mining & Excavation Cartel]] has had enough of this semi-official banditry.  Their local subsidiary, Transpax Inc., has offered contracts to defend their assets, and forcibly remove militia blockades and checkpoints from their transportation routes. In response to Transpax's overtures, a faction of the planetary militia, now styling themselves the Halloran Protectorate, have hired [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBurrsBlackCobras],Burr's Black Cobras]] to augment their forces.
